results.title: Co-delivery of metformin and levofloxacin hydrochloride using biodegradable thermosensitive hydrogel for the treatment of corneal neovascularization
results.text_hl: (A) Representative cornea images of one day after @<m>DISEASE_Hypercalcemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006934 @@@alkali burn@@@ and seven days after @<m>DISEASE_Hypercalcemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006934 @@@alkali burn@@@ with different treatment.
